original_text: From the day that the ark was lodged at Kiriath-jearim, a long time passed, some twenty years, and all the house of Israel lamented after the Lord.
korean_text: 궤가 기럇여아림에 들어간 날부터 이십 년 동안 오래 있은지라 이스라엘 온 족속이 여호와를 사모하니라

sentences.original_text: From the day that the ark was lodged at Kiriath-jearim
and all the house of Israel lamented after the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 이스라엘 온 족속이 여호와를 애통하였더라
